lines.text: It's the skating isn't it? It's that insane disco music thing!
Daddy, I need to ask you a favor.

[coming into the room]
Well, as long as it's not about skating, or disco music.
Get the goons with the fruit!
So what, I'm a musical genius! Whatta drag! Whatta bummer!

[to the breast-grabbing Franklin]
I swear, you've got more hands than a poker game!
Our little genius is throwing a temper tantrum!

[to Bobby James while skating down a hill]
You're heading for the Olympics; I'm heading for broken bones.
She's probably some rink skater from Beverly Hills.
Do you have a mental problem or something? First you want to skate then you don't want to skate.
